abstract: Supreme Court of Papua New Guinea rules country's detention of migrants seeking asylum in Australia to be illegal and orders Papua New Guinea and Australia to end detentions; Australian Immigration Min Peter Dutton says country will continue its hard-line stance against migrants.
lead_paragraph: An Australian official said the ruling would not mean that the asylum seekers being held at the island center would be admitted to the country.

headline.main: Papua New Guinea Finds Australian Offshore Detention Center Illegal
headline.print_headline: Court Rejects Detentions of Migrants to Australia

snippet: An Australian official said the ruling would not mean that the asylum seekers being held at the island center would be admitted to the country.
